languages.text: {n}Ханн хмурится.{/n} "В посылке находился артефакт {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. Бомба Хаоса, я бы сказал. Как только ее вынули из защитного кокона, команда начала сходить с ума и мутировать. Первым под воздействие попал капитан и высшие офицеры, но эффект распространился с невероятной скоростью. Все палубы оказались охвачены, все до единой. Беснующиеся мутанты, потерявшие разум, повредили многие системы. Судно терпело бедствие и почти наверняка погибло бы, если бы я экстренно не вывел его из {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ханн хмурится.{/n} "В посылке находился артефакт Хаоса. Бомба Хаоса, я бы сказал. Как только ее вынули из защитного кокона, команда начала сходить с ума и мутировать. Первым под воздействие попал капитан и высшие офицеры, но эффект распространился с невероятной скоростью. Все палубы оказались охвачены, все до единой. Беснующиеся мутанты, потерявшие разум, повредили многие системы. Судно терпело бедствие и почти наверняка погибло бы, если бы я экстренно не вывел его из варпа".

languages.text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ханн хмурится.{/n} "В посылке находился артефакт {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. Бомба Хаоса, я бы сказал. Как только ее вынули из защитного кокона, команда начала сходить с ума и мутировать. Первым под воздействие попал капитан и высшие офицеры, но эффект распространился с невероятной скоростью. Все палубы оказались охвачены, все до единой. Беснующиеся мутанты, потерявшие разум, повредили многие системы. Судно терпело бедствие и почти наверняка погибло бы, если бы я экстренно не вывел его из {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a Chaos artifact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the Captain and the top officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was caught in it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to the emergency exit out of the warp."

The first to be afflicted was the Captain and the top officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was caught in it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to the emergency exit out of the warp."

The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the warp."

{n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

languages.text: {n}ハンは顔をしかめた。{/n}「荷物には{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}のアーティファクトが入っていたのです。簡単に言うと『渾沌の爆弾』のようなものなのでしょう。保護容器から取り出された瞬間、クルーは正気を失い変異し始めたのです。一番最初に影響を受けたのは船長と上級士官らでしたが、驚異的な速さで周囲に影響が広がりました。甲板はすべて飲みこまれてしまい、怒れる変異体たちは正気を失い、多くのシステムを破壊しました。船は窮地に立たされ、我々が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}からの緊急脱出を試みなければ、ほぼ間違いなく破壊されていたでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンは顔をしかめた。{/n}「荷物には{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の遺物が入っていたのです。簡単に言うと"渾沌の爆弾"のようなものなのでしょう。保護容器から取り出された瞬間、クルーは正気を失い変異し始めたのです。一番最初に影響を受けたのは船長と上級士官らでしたが、驚異的な速さで周囲に影響が広がりました。甲板はすべて飲みこまれてしまい、怒れる変異体たちは正気を失い、多くのシステムを破壊しました。船は窮地に立たされ、我々が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}からの緊急脱出を試みなければ、ほぼ間違いなく破壊されていたでしょう」

languages.text: {n}汉恩皱起眉头。{/n}“那个包裹里装着一件{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}造物，您可以称它为混沌炸弹。它从包裹里取出的那一刻起，船员们就发了疯，产生了变异。最先受害的是舰长和高阶军官，随后，混沌的影响以难以置信的速度在船上蔓延。所有甲板都遭到了吞噬，无一例外。那群狂暴的变种人破坏了很多系统，如果我当时没有从{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中紧急跳出，这艘飞船肯定会遇难。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩皱起眉头。{/n}“那个包裹里装着一件{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}造物，您可以称它为混沌炸弹。它从包裹里取出的那一刻起，船员们就发了疯，产生了变异。最先受害的是舰长和高阶军官，随后，混沌的影响以难以置信的速度在船上蔓延。所有甲板都遭到了吞噬，无一例外。那群狂暴的变种人破坏了很多系统，如果我当时没有从{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中紧急跳出，这艘飞船肯定会遇难。”

languages.text: {n}Hann frunce el ceño.{/n} «El paquete contenía un artefacto del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. Una bomba de Caos, por así decirlo. En cuanto fue retirado de su envoltorio protector, la tripulación empezó a perder la cabeza y mutar. Los primeros afectados fueron el capitán y los oficiales superiores, pero el efecto se propagó rápidamente. Todas las cubiertas, desde la primera a la última, fueron consumidas. Los mutantes, enloquecidos, destrozaron numerosos sistemas. La nave corría peligro y sin duda habría sido destruida si no hubiera ejecutado una salida de emergencia de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann frunce el ceño.{/n} «El paquete contenía un artefacto del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. Una bomba de Caos, por así decirlo. En cuanto fue retirado de su envoltorio protector, la tripulación empezó a perder la cabeza y mutar. Los primeros afectados fueron el capitán y los oficiales superiores, pero el efecto se propagó rápidamente. Todas las cubiertas, desde la primera a la última, fueron consumidas. Los mutantes, enloquecidos, destrozaron numerosos sistemas. La nave corría peligro y sin duda habría sido destruida si no hubiera ejecutado una salida de emergencia de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}».

languages.text: {n}Hann fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Le colis contenait un artefact du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} ; une sorte de bombe, dirons-nous. À l'instant où l'objet a été retiré de son cocon protecteur, l'équipage s'est mis à perdre la tête et à se transformer. Les premières victimes ont été le capitaine et les officiers supérieurs, mais l'effet n'a pas tardé à se propager à une vitesse inquiétante pour frapper tous les ponts, jusqu'au dernier. Déchaînés et devenus fous, les mutants ont alors endommagé la majeure partie de nos systèmes. Le vaisseau s'est retrouvé en détresse et aurait très certainement été détruit si je n'avais pas pris la décision de quitter le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} en urgence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

À l'instant où l'objet a été retiré de son cocon protecteur, l'équipage s'est mis à perdre la tête et à se transformer. Les premières victimes ont été le capitaine et les officiers supérieurs, mais l'effet n'a pas tardé à se propager à une vitesse inquiétante pour frapper tous les ponts, jusqu'au dernier. Déchaînés et devenus fous, les mutants ont alors endommagé la majeure partie de nos systèmes. Le vaisseau s'est retrouvé en détresse et aurait très certainement été détruit si je n'avais pas pris la décision de quitter le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} en urgence. »

languages.text: {n}Hann verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Das Paket enthielt ein {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}-Artefakt. Eine Chaosbombe sozusagen. Sobald sie aus ihrem schützenden Kokon genommen wurde, verlor die Crew den Verstand und begann zu mutieren. Zuerst betroffen waren der Captain und die leitenden Offiziere, aber die Wirkung breitete sich mit unglaublicher Geschwindigkeit aus. Jedes Deck wurde davon verschlungen, jedes einzelne. Die tobenden Mutanten waren nicht mehr bei Verstand und beschädigten zahlreiche Systeme. Das Schiff war in Schwierigkeiten und wäre ziemlich sicher zerstört worden, hätte ich keinen Notausstieg aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} durchgeführt."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Das Paket enthielt ein {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}-Artefakt. Eine Chaosbombe sozusagen. Sobald sie aus ihrem schützenden Kokon genommen wurde, verlor die Crew den Verstand und begann zu mutieren. Zuerst betroffen waren der Captain und die leitenden Offiziere, aber die Wirkung breitete sich mit unglaublicher Geschwindigkeit aus. Jedes Deck wurde davon verschlungen, jedes einzelne. Die tobenden Mutanten waren nicht mehr bei Verstand und beschädigten zahlreiche Systeme. Das Schiff war in Schwierigkeiten und wäre ziemlich sicher zerstört worden, hätte ich keinen Notaussieg aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} durchgeführt."

languages.text: {n}Hann kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Paket bir {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} eserini, daha doğrusu bir Kaos bombasını ihtiva ediyormuş. Koruyucu kozasından çıkarıldığı an mürettebat aklını yitirmeye, mutasyon geçirmeye başladı. İlk etkilenenler kaptan ve kıdemli subaylar oldu, sonrasında inanılmaz bir hızla yayıldı. Bütün güverteleri, tek tek her birini tüketti. Aklını yitirmiş, kontrolden çıkan mutantlar sayısız sisteme hasar verdi. Gemi büyük tehlike altındaydı. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyuttan{/g} acil çıkış yaptırmasaydım neredeyse kesin bir şekilde yok olacaktı."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann frowns.{/n} "The package contained a {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} artefact. A Chaos bomb, if you will. The moment it was removed from its protective cocoon, the crew began to lose their mind and mutate. The first to be afflicted was the captain and the senior officers, but the effect spread with incredible speed. Every deck was consumed by it, every last one. The raging mutants, no longer sane, damaged many systems. The ship was in distress and would have almost certainly been destroyed had I not resorted to making an emergency exit from the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Paket bir {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} eseri ihtiva ediyormuş. Bir nevi bir Kaos bombası. Koruyucu kozasından çıkarıldığı an mürettebat aklını yitirmeye ve mutasyon geçirmeye başladı. İlk etkilenenler kaptan ve kıdemli subaylar oldu ancak etki inanılmaz bir hızla yayıldı. Bütün güverteleri tüketti. Tek tek her birini. Aklını yitirmiş, kontrolden çıkan mutantlar sayısız sisteme hasar verdiler. Gemi büyük tehlike altındaydı ve {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}tan acil çıkış yaptırmasaydım neredeyse kesin bir şekilde yok olacaktı."
